mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM NOTICE
SELECT N.ID, N.TITLE, N.CONTENT, N.VIEWS, N.CREATED, S.NAME AS staffName FROM NOTICE N JOIN STAFF S ON N.STAFF_ID = S.ID WHERE N.ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE (ID, STAFF_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, VIEWS, CREATED) VALUES (NOTICE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{staffId}, #{title}, #{content}, 0, SYSDATE)
